content.name: member_collect
content.prop: member x (collect P) = P x

content.name: empty_set
content.prop: empty_set = {x. false}

content.name: univ
content.prop: univ = {x. true}

content.name: member_empty
content.prop: ~(member x empty_set)

content.name: member_univ
content.prop: member x univ

content.name: member_ext
content.prop: (!x. member x A = member x B) --> A = B

content.name: subset
content.prop: subset A B = (!x. member x A --> member x B)

content.name: subsetI

proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B
∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B ⊢ A ⊆ B
⊢ (∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B) ⟶ A ⊆ B

content.prop: (!x. member x A --> member x B) --> subset A B

content.name: subsetE

proof.th: A ⊆ B ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, x ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ B
⊢ A ⊆ B ⟶ x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B

content.prop: subset A B --> member x A --> member x B

content.name: subset_empty
content.prop: subset empty_set A

content.name: subset_univ

proof.th: ⊢ ∀x. member x A ⟶ member x univ
member x A ⊢ member x A
⊢ ∀x. member x A ⟶ member x univ

content.prop: subset A univ

content.name: subset_refl

proof.th: ⊢ ∀x. member x A ⟶ member x A
member x A ⊢ member x A
⊢ ∀x. member x A ⟶ member x A

content.prop: subset A A

content.name: subset_antisym

proof.th: A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟷ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A, x ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ x ∈ B ⟶ x ∈ A
B ⊆ A, A ⊆ B, x ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ A
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ x ∈ B ⟶ x ∈ A
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ x ∈ A ⟷ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟷ x ∈ B
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ A ⊢ A = B
⊢ A ⊆ B ⟶ B ⊆ A ⟶ A = B

content.prop: subset A B --> subset B A --> A = B

content.name: subset_trans

proof.th: A ⊆ B, B ⊆ C ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ C
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ C, x ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ B
B ⊆ C, A ⊆ B, x ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ C
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ C ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ C
A ⊆ B, B ⊆ C ⊢ A ⊆ C
⊢ A ⊆ B ⟶ B ⊆ C ⟶ A ⊆ C

content.prop: subset A B --> subset B C --> subset A C

content.name: inter
content.prop: inter A B = {x. (member x A) & (member x B)}

content.name: union
content.prop: union A B = {x. (member x A) | (member x B)}

content.name: member_inter_iff

proof.args: member_collect, x ∈ {x. x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B} = (x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ {x. x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B} = (x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B)

proof.args: inter_def, x ∈ A ∩ B = (x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ A ∩ B = (x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B)

content.prop: member x (inter A B) = ((member x A) & (member x B))

content.name: member_union_iff

proof.args: member_collect, x ∈ {x. x ∈ A ∨ x ∈ B} = (x ∈ A ∨ x ∈ B)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ {x. x ∈ A ∨ x ∈ B} = (x ∈ A ∨ x ∈ B)

proof.args: union_def, x ∈ A ∪ B = (x ∈ A ∨ x ∈ B)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ A ∪ B = (x ∈ A ∨ x ∈ B)

content.prop: member x (union A B) = ((member x A) | (member x B))

content.name: subset_union_id

proof.th: ⊢ ∀x. member x A ⟶ member x (union A B)
member x A ⊢ member x A

proof.args: disjI1, {}, {A: member x A, B: member x B}
proof.th: member x A ⊢ member x A ∨ member x B
member x A ⊢ member x (union A B)
⊢ ∀x. member x A ⟶ member x (union A B)

content.prop: subset A (union A B)

content.name: inter_subset_id

proof.th: x ∈ A ∩ B ⊢ x ∈ A ∩ B
x ∈ A ∩ B ⊢ x ∈ A ∧ x ∈ B

content.prop: subset (inter A B) A

content.name: cantor

proof.th: f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x} ⊢ f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x} ⊢ x ∈ f x ⟶ false
x ∈ f x ⊢ x ∈ f x
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}, x ∈ f x ⊢ x ∈ {x. ¬x ∈ f x}
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}, x ∈ f x ⊢ ¬x ∈ f x
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}, x ∈ f x ⊢ false
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x} ⊢ x ∈ f x ⟶ false
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x} ⊢ ¬x ∈ f x ⟶ false
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}, ¬x ∈ f x ⊢ ¬x ∈ {x. ¬x ∈ f x}
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}, ¬x ∈ f x ⊢ ¬¬x ∈ f x
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x}, ¬x ∈ f x ⊢ false
f x = {x. ¬x ∈ f x} ⊢ ¬x ∈ f x ⟶ false

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a set}, {P: λS. ∀x. ¬f x = S, a: {x. ¬x ∈ f x}}

content.prop: ∃S. ∀x. ~ f x  = S

content.name: insert
content.prop: insert x A = {y. y = x | member y A}

content.name: member_insert

proof.args: member_collect, y ∈ {y. y = x ∨ y ∈ A} = (y = x ∨ y ∈ A)
proof.th: ⊢ y ∈ {y. y = x ∨ y ∈ A} = (y = x ∨ y ∈ A)

proof.args: insert_def, y ∈ insert x A = (y = x ∨ y ∈ A)
proof.th: ⊢ y ∈ insert x A = (y = x ∨ y ∈ A)

content.prop: (y ∈ (insert x A)) = (y = x | (y ∈ A))

content.name: member_singleton
content.prop: member y {x} <--> y = x

content.name: in_sing

proof.th: x = y ∨ x ∈ ∅ ⊢ x = y ∨ x ∈ ∅
x = y ∨ x ∈ ∅ ⊢ x ∈ ∅ ⟶ x = y
x = y ∨ x ∈ ∅ ⊢ x ∈ ∅ ⟶ x = y

content.prop: member x {y} = (x = y)

content.name: finite_empty
content.prop: finite (empty_set::'a set)

content.name: finite_insert
content.prop: finite A --> finite (insert x A)

content.name: nat_interval
content.prop: nat_interval m n = {p. less_eq m p & less_eq p n}

content.name: Union
content.prop: Union S = {x. ?A. member x A & member A S}

content.name: member_Union

proof.args: member_collect, x ∈ {x. ∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S} ⟷ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ {x. ∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S} ⟷ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S)

proof.args: Union_def, x ∈ Union S ⟷ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ Union S ⟷ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S)

content.prop: member x (Union S) <--> (?A. member x A & member A S)

content.name: Inter
content.prop: Inter S = {x. !A. member A S --> member x A}

content.name: member_Inter

proof.args: member_collect, x ∈ {x. ∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A} ⟷ (∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ {x. ∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A} ⟷ (∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A)

proof.args: Inter_def, x ∈ Inter S ⟷ (∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A)
proof.th: ⊢ x ∈ Inter S ⟷ (∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A)

content.prop: member x (Inter S) <--> (!A. member A S --> member x A)

content.name: Union_empty

proof.th: x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ ∅ ⊢ x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ ∅

content.prop: Union (empty_set::'a set set) = empty_set

content.name: Inter_empty
content.prop: Inter (empty_set::'a set set) = univ

content.name: subset_Union

proof.th: x ∈ A, A ∈ S ⊢ x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a set}, {P: λA. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ S, a: A}
proof.th: A ∈ S, x ∈ A ⊢ ∃a. x ∈ a ∧ a ∈ S

content.prop: member A S --> subset A (Union S)

content.name: Inter_subset
content.prop: member A S --> subset (Inter S) A

content.name: subset_Inter

proof.th: ∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C ⊢ ∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ ⋂S
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C, x ∈ A ⊢ ∀A. A ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ A
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C, C ∈ S ⊢ A ⊆ C
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C, C ∈ S, x ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ C
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C, x ∈ A ⊢ ∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ x ∈ C
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C, x ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ ⋂S
∀C. C ∈ S ⟶ A ⊆ C ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ ⋂S

content.prop: (!C. member C S --> subset A C) --> subset A (Inter S)

content.name: Union_union

proof.th: x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B) ⊢ ∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ x ∈ C
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ C ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ C ∈ A ∨ C ∈ B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ C ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a set}, {P: λA. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A, a: C}
proof.th: x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ A ⊢ ∃a. x ∈ a ∧ a ∈ A
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ C ∈ A ⟶ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ C ∈ B ⟶ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), C ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a set}, {P: λA. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ B, a: C}
proof.th: x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ B ⊢ ∃a. x ∈ a ∧ a ∈ B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, C ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ C ∈ B ⟶ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B, x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B) ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A ∨ x ∈ ⋃B
x ∈ ⋃(A ∪ B), x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A ⟶ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B)
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ C
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ C ∈ A

proof.args: disjI1, {}, {A: C ∈ A, B: C ∈ B}
proof.th: x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃A, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ C ∈ A ∨ C ∈ B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃A, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ C ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃A, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a set}, {P: λA. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B, a: C}
proof.th: x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃A, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ⊢ ∃a. x ∈ a ∧ a ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃A ⟶ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B)
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃B ⟶ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B)
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ C
x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ C ∈ B

proof.args: disjI2, {}, {A: C ∈ A, B: C ∈ B}
proof.th: x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃B, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ C ∈ A ∨ C ∈ B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃B, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ C ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃B, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ A ∪ B

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a set}, {P: λA. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B, a: C}
proof.th: x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B, x ∈ ⋃B, x ∈ C ∧ C ∈ B ⊢ ∃a. x ∈ a ∧ a ∈ A ∪ B
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B ⊢ x ∈ ⋃B ⟶ (∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B)
x ∈ ⋃A ∪ ⋃B ⊢ ∃A. x ∈ A ∧ A ∈ A ∪ B

content.prop: Union (union A B) = union (Union A) (Union B)

content.name: bnd_mono
content.prop: bnd_mono h ⟷ (∀W. ∀X. W ⊆ X ⟶ h W ⊆ h X)

content.name: lfp
content.prop: lfp h = ⋂{X. h X ⊆ X}

content.name: lfp_lowerbound

proof.th: h A ⊆ A ⊢ h A ⊆ A
h A ⊆ A ⊢ A ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X}
h A ⊆ A ⊢ ⋂{X. h X ⊆ X} ⊆ A
h A ⊆ A ⊢ lfp h ⊆ A
⊢ h A ⊆ A ⟶ lfp h ⊆ A

content.prop: subset (h A) A --> subset (lfp h) A

content.name: lfp_greatest

proof.th: ∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X ⊢ ∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X
∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X ⊢ ∀C. C ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X} ⟶ A ⊆ C
C ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X} ⊢ C ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X}
C ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X} ⊢ h C ⊆ C
∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X, C ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X} ⊢ A ⊆ C
∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X ⊢ ∀C. C ∈ {X. h X ⊆ X} ⟶ A ⊆ C
∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X ⊢ A ⊆ ⋂{X. h X ⊆ X}
∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X ⊢ A ⊆ lfp h
⊢ (∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ A ⊆ X) ⟶ A ⊆ lfp h

content.prop: (!X. subset (h X) X --> subset A X) --> subset A (lfp h)

content.name: lfp_unfold

proof.th: bnd_mono h ⊢ ∀W. ∀X. W ⊆ X ⟶ h W ⊆ h X
bnd_mono h ⊢ ∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ h (lfp h) ⊆ X
h X ⊆ X ⊢ h X ⊆ X
h X ⊆ X ⊢ lfp h ⊆ X
bnd_mono h, h X ⊆ X ⊢ h (lfp h) ⊆ h X
bnd_mono h, h X ⊆ X ⊢ h (lfp h) ⊆ X
bnd_mono h ⊢ ∀X. h X ⊆ X ⟶ h (lfp h) ⊆ X
bnd_mono h ⊢ h (lfp h) ⊆ lfp h
bnd_mono h ⊢ h (h (lfp h)) ⊆ h (lfp h)
bnd_mono h ⊢ lfp h ⊆ h (lfp h)
bnd_mono h ⊢ h (lfp h) = lfp h
⊢ bnd_mono h ⟶ h (lfp h) = lfp h

content.prop: bnd_mono h --> h (lfp h) = lfp h
